text:
Created attachment 23116
Test example with output

Hi,
The implementation of the Sort (sorted resource collection) using a TreeMap results in a filtering when the entries have the same key; the last entry added will be the one listed.
E.g I have tried to sort a list of files using the Date comparator and only 29 of the 49 files are listed because multiple files has the exact same last modified date.
My suggestion is that the implementation should use the Collections sort.

current workaround is:
<sort>
  <fileset dir="${path.dist.lib}" includes="**/*.jar" />
  <reverse xmlns="antlib:org.apache.tools.ant.types.resources.comparators">
    <date />
  </reverse>
  <name xmlns="antlib:org.apache.tools.ant.types.resources.comparators" />
</sort>
creator: kep@cdrator.com
